localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: 2020 was one of the best years ever for US home price appreciation, up 10% nominal and 9% real. https://t.co/vfoEvh3YAD
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 2020年是美国房价有史以来升值最好的年份之一，名义上涨10%，实际上涨9%。https://t.co/vfoEvh3YAD。
2020年是美國房價有史以來升值最好的年份之一，名義上漲10%，實際上漲9%。https://t.co/vfoEvh3YAD。

previous.excerpt: Acumen is the secret weapon dev teams use to deliver high-quality software on time. The platform unifies and analyzes engineering data to create a high-res picture of the team’s activities and recommends steps to avoid risks and boost productivity.
previous.title: Acumen - GPS for software engineering teams

localize.description: Acumen是开发团队按时交付高质量软件的秘密武器。该平台统一并分析工程数据，以创建团队活动的高分辨率图像，并推荐避免风险和提高生产力的步骤。
Acumen是開發團隊按時交付高質量軟件的祕密武器。該平臺統一併分析工程數據，以創建團隊活動的高分辨率圖像，並推薦避免風險和提高生產力的步驟。

next.excerpt: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
next.title: Doppler Share - Share one-off secrets with end-to-end encryption 🤫

localize.description: 多普勒分享是一种简单的端到端加密分享一次性秘密的方式，链接在一定的浏览量和天数后自动失效。
localize.tagline: 使用端到端加密共享一次性秘密 🤫。

localize.description: 多普勒分享是一種簡單的端到端加密分享一次性祕密的方式，鏈接在一定的瀏覽量和天數後自動失效。
localize.tagline: 使用端到端加密共享一次性祕密 🤫。
